spiritsExplanation: The playlist titled '30 MINUTE INSPIRED & STRONG WALK' suggests a focus on a rhythmic walking experience with a motivational and transformative theme, as highlighted by the description which mentions feeling 'inspired, creative, and strong.' This aligns well with the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit (score: 0.75), as the mixture of tempos and musical genres (including house, hip hop, and EDM) supports a steady walking pace that synchronizes movement with beat-driven music. The 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit (score: 0.65) is also relevant due to the playlist's mention of enhancing personal transformation and the option to be used outside, invoking exploration and immersiveness. Meanwhile, tracks like 'Runaway (U & I)' and 'WIN' with high-energy EDM and hip-hop influences, suggest elements of the 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit (score: 0.6), supporting vigorous movement and increased heart rate. Other potential spirits such as 'Soothing & Restorative' were excluded due to the lack of calming elements in the playlist metadata, focusing more on energetic and structured soundscapes.
